Class ExceptionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • by.netcracker.web.controller.ExceptionController

  • @ControllerAdvice
public class ExceptionController
extends Object
    This is controller advice. It is processing exception.

    1.0

    Hromenkov Ilya

    • Method Detail

      • customException

        @ExceptionHandler(value=WebException.class)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView customException(WebException ex)
        This method processing WebException and return "error" page and error message.
        Parameters:
        ex - Get WebException.
        Returns:
        ModelAndView - "error" page and error message.

      • statusCustomException

        @ExceptionHandler(value=org.springframework.web.HttpRequestMethodNotSupportedException.class)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView statusCustomException()
        This method work when incoming Not Supported Exception in Http Request. Example: 405 error.
        Returns:
        ModelAndView - "error" page and error message
